contents.content: You can change the app language using following steps:
steps: Click on the Menu icon in the top right corner of the app.
Click on Settings.
Under app settings, click on the App Language option.
Select the language you want to use.
Click on the Check Icon on the top right corner.
Confirm the changes.

contents.content: You can change the app theme using following steps:
steps: Click on the Menu icon in the top right corner of the app.
Click on Settings.
Under app settings, click on the Theme option.
Select the theme you want to use.

contents.content: QuranApp offers Verse of the Day feature which notifies you a verse from the Qur'an daily in the morning. You can turn verse of the day on/off using following steps:
steps: Click on the Menu icon in the top right corner of the app.
Click on Settings.
Under app settings, click on the Verse of the Day option.
Select on/off.

contents.content: QuranApp offers several translations in different languages. It allows you to select and read multiple translations simultaneously. You can select multiple translations using following steps:
steps: Click on the Menu icon in the top right corner of the app.
Click on Settings.
Under reader settings, click on the Translations option.
Select the desired translations.

contents.content: You can also download more translations by clicking on the download icon on the top right corner.
You can select reciter using following steps:
steps: Click on the Menu icon in the top right corner of the app.
Click on Settings.
Under reader settings, click on the Select Reciter option.
Select the desired reciter.

contents.content: You can also change reciter from the reader. To do this, Click on the Menu icon in the bottom right corner of the recitation player. Then, Select Reciter > Select the desired reciter.
QuranApp offers several Qura'n fonts which you can select using following steps:
steps: Click on the Menu icon in the top right corner of the app.
Click on Settings.
Under reader settings, click on the Select Script option.
Select the desired font. It will be globally applied.

contents.content: You can customize font sizes of both arabic text and translations using following steps:
steps: Click on the Menu icon in the top right corner of the app.
Click on Settings.
Scroll down to Text Size option. Drag Arabic text size to change the arabic text size and Translation text size to change the translations' text size
